actions

Class ActionGenerator_Uniform

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.ActionGenerator_Uniform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IActionGenerator

    public class ActionGenerator_Uniform
extends Object
implements IActionGenerator
    Gives the same choice of actions at every node, with the exception that a new Node must not be given the same key combination options as its parent (i.e. two nodes in a row shouldn't be QP).
    Author:
    matt
